column3: School of Criminology and Criminal Justice
column5: Forensic evidence is a vital component in bringing perpetrators to justice. On this MSc Forensic Investigation degree course, you'll learn the practical skills and theories that underpin forensic science and its role in criminal justice, from the investigation to the courtroom.Developed with our partners in law enforcement and forensic science, including Hampshire Constabulary, Key Forensic Services and Forensic Access, this course will build your experience of forensic methods in realistic settings, such as our Crime Scene Simulation Spaces.You'll study the extent and nature of forensic practices, and explore how best to deploy them, so you can form strategic forensic responses in the investigation of crime within your career.
